sentences.en: A penumbra of doubt surrounds the incident.
sentences.cn: 疑惑的阴影笼罩着该事件((真相不明)).

sentences.en: Downtown Chicago and its penumbra also stand rejuvenated ( John McCormick )
sentences.cn: 芝加哥城商业中心及其周边地区都恢复了生机 ( 约翰麦考密克 )

sentences.en: In additional, the luminance step is applied to detect the penumbra.
sentences.cn: 另外, 提出了亮度步长的方法来检测阴影中的半影.

sentences.en: In the outer part of that shadow, the penumbra, part of the Sun, is blocked.
sentences.cn: 而影子外面部分的半影，被太阳的一部分挡住。

sentences.en: It is still in the primary stage of the penumbra study in neonate with HIE.
sentences.cn: 对于新生儿HIE中半暗带的研究,现还处于初级阶段.

sentences.en: Moon enters penumbra: instant of first external tangency of moon with the penumbra.
sentences.cn: 半影食始：月球刚刚和半影接触，这时肉眼觉察不到。

sentences.en: Partial solar eclipses occur when the Moon's penumbra touches Earth; partial lunar eclipses occur when the only part of the Moon passes through Earth's umbra.
sentences.cn: 地球上被月球半影扫过的地方可见日偏食，而当只有部份月球进入地球本影时， 月偏食便会发生。

sentences.en: The area of the penumbra was measured and analyzed with an image analysis system.
sentences.cn: 通过甲苯胺蓝染色、焦油紫染色并利用图像分析仪测量半影区面积.

sentences.en: Thus the penumbra and DND are the current targets in stroke treatment studies.
sentences.cn: 保护这部分神经元的完整性和功能是目前治疗脑卒中的目标.

sentences.en: Traditionally, the word wangliang has three different meanings penumbra and elf.
sentences.cn: “罔两”一词历来向有“无据依”、“景外微阴”及“精怪”三义.

words.tran_cn: 日月半影的；界限不明的

trans.tran_cn: 黑影周围的半阴影，半影，边缘，外围
